title: Merry Tom of all trades. Or, A trick to get mony at every dead lift, made known by Tom of all trades that bravely could shift. : From one place to another about he did range, and at his own pleasure his trade he could change. : The tune is, Behold the man. &c.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles. T Vere, and W. Gilbertson,
